Name: Beaver Clicker
About the game: Beaver Clicker is a fun, casual, and strategic Idle Game The game gives you 1 goal, collect L O G. To help you with this endeavour, you will get help from all kinds of places, like recruiting Squirrels, and even various sorts of Fungi to help you in your wood collecting journey Features: Use logs to get even more logs Collect tons of achievements! Contains at least 17 beavers Get your own pet beaver :) Cloud saving, so you can keep the beavers you love safe <3 Wait there's 19 beavers now?? Gluten-free Many unique power-ups Oh, I thought i might have found the 20th beaver, but it was actually just the 7th one again & Much Much More! P.S if you play this, please count all the beavers for me
